name: Plant Care Dashboard
description: A serene, editorial-style mobile dashboard for tracking plant care tasks with elegant typography and soft illustrations.

render.notes: I used CSS gradients and pseudo-elements to create abstract representations of the plant illustrations (Calla Lilies and Orchids) to maintain the visual style without external assets. The typography uses 'Playfair Display' for the elegant serif headings and 'DM Sans' for the clean UI text.
